title: Women's Premium Ultra Soft Patterned Leggings
features: ➤ PREMIUM HIGH QUALITY LEGGINGS! Full Length / Buttery Soft / Super Stretch leggings! Many Patterns for you to choose from!
➤ AVAILABLE IN 2 SIZES! One Size (fits Small to Large Size 4-10) / Plus Size (fits X-Large Size 10-14)
➤ LONG LASTING, DURABLE LEGGINGS! Machine-washable, recommended cold hand wash, hang dry
➤ ULTRA COMFORTABLE STRETCHY LEGGINGS! Made from 92% Polyester 8% Spandex
➤ FULL LENGTH & FORM FITTING! Fitted, Tapered leggings that hit between calf and ankle; Great layer piece
description: ✺Women's Butter Soft Leggings - Super Soft with the Ultimate Stretch✺
With a Comfortable 1" Waistband these Super Lightweight Butter Soft Leggings provide maximum comfort for a low price!
Available in 2 Sizes! One Size (S-M-L) Plus Size (XL-XXL)
◆ Wash with like colors ◆ Hand Wash Cold ◆ Do Not Bleach ◆ Do Not Iron ◆ Do Not Dry Clean ◆ Hang Dry
